SELECT M.* ,A.COURSE_CODE ,B.COURSE_NAME ,A.YEAR ,A.MONTH ,IFNULL(A.CHASU, 0) CHASU ,C.CATEGORY_NAME ,IFNULL(A.OPEN_YN,'N') OPEN_YN ,IFNULL(A.CLOSE_YN,'N') CLOSE_YN FROM MAIN_PAGE M LEFT OUTER JOIN COURSE A ON A.COURSE_ID = M.COURSE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COURSE_CODE B ON A.COURSE_CODE = B.COURSE_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT C3.CODE C3_CODE, C2.CODE C2_CODE, C1.CODE C1_CODE, CONCAT(C1.CODE_NAME,' > ',C2.CODE_NAME,' > ',C3.CODE_NAME) CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY C3 LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY C2 ON C3.PARENT_CODE = C2.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY C1 ON C2.PARENT_CODE = C1.CODE WHERE C3.DEPTH = 3) C ON B.CODE = C.C3_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COURSE_MASTER D ON D.COURSE_CODE = A.COURSE_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMPANY E ON E.COMP_CD = A.COMP_CD WHERE 1 = 1
AND IFNULL(A.COMP_CD,'B2C') = 'B2C'
AND IFNULL(A.COMP_CD,'B2C') != 'B2C' AND IFNULL(E.C2C_YN,'N') = 'N'
AND IFNULL(A.COMP_CD,'B2C') != 'B2C' AND IFNULL(E.C2C_YN,'N') = 'Y'
AND IFNULL(A.COMP_CD,'B2C') = #{COMPANY2}
AND IFNULL(M.POPULAR_YN,'N') IN ('Y')
AND IFNULL(M.RECOMMEND_YN,'N') IN ('Y')
AND IFNULL(A.NEW_YN,'N') IN ('Y')
ORDER BY E.COMP_NAME, C.CATEGORY_NAME,B.COURSE_NAME,A.YEAR,A.MONTH,A.CHASU
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAIN_PAGE (COMP_CD, COURSE_ID, RECOMMEND_YN, RECOMMEND_ORD, RECOMMEND_COLOR, NEW_YN, NEW_ORD, NEW_COLOR, POPULAR_YN, POPULAR_ORD, POPULAR_COLOR, MAIN_OPEN_YN, CATEGORY_MAIN_YN, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{COMP_CD}, #{COURSE_ID}, #{RECOMMEND_YN}, #{RECOMMEND_ORD}, #{RECOMMEND_COLOR}, #{NEW_YN}, #{NEW_ORD}, #{NEW_COLOR}, #{POPULAR_YN}, #{POPULAR_ORD}, #{POPULAR_COLOR}, #{MAIN_OPEN_YN}, #{CATEGORY_MAIN_YN}, #{SESSION_USER_ID}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE MAIN_PAGE SET UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,UPDATE_USER = #{SESSION_USER_ID} ,POPULAR_IMG1 = 'Y' ,POPULAR_IMG2 = 'Y' ,NEW_IMG1 = 'Y' ,NEW_IMG2 = 'Y' ,RECOMMEND_IMG1 = 'Y' ,RECOMMEND_IMG2 = 'Y' WHERE COMP_CD = #{COMP_CD} AND COURSE_ID = #{COURSE_ID}
